scripts.lint: npm run license && eslint --fix --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern src/ test/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run bundle && ncp appsscript.json dist/appsscript.json
scripts.env:setup: gh secret set CLASPRC_JSON --body "$(cat ~/.clasprc.json)" && gh secret set CLASPRC_DEV_JSON --body "$(cat .clasp-dev.json)" && gh secret set CLASPRC_PROD_JSON --body "$(cat .clasp-prod.json)"
scripts.deploy: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && ncp .clasp-dev.json .clasp.json && clasp push -f
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && ncp .clasp-prod.json .clasp.json && clasp push
